name: Postal Pup
description:
Postal Pup is a bite-sized game about delivering mail made in a single day for Ludum Dare 42! (prototype edition)

---

CONTROLS

Movement: WASD, Left, Right, Up, Down
Interact: Space

---

Created by Kiana Mosser (@kianamosser) and Matt Fisher (@MattFDraws). Kiana did the paintings, title screen, and backgrounds. Matt did the character designs, and both of us programmed. We were only available for one day during LD42, but feel free to check out what we created in that time!
